title: Torrent Search Engine Gadget for Windows Vista Sidebar
description:
A real basic Google custom engine that searches for torrents from your desktop Sidebar in Windows Vista. Just put the title of the software, movie, game, etc in the search box, and it&#039;ll find what your looking for from the most common torrent sites- Mininova, Sourceforge, Piratebay, ScrapeTorrent to name a few.


If it doesn&#039;t automatically install:
1.Simply copy ?%userprofile%AppDataLocalMicrosoftWindows SidebarGadgets? and paste in Windows explorer address bar.

2. When you get to that folder Copy and Paste the ?TorrentGadget.Gadget? folder there.

3. Add it to the sidebar from your sidebar gallery.

enjoy
